titleStmt.title: Letter, H.R. Frost in Charleston, S.C., to J.G.M. Ramsey, in Charleston, S.C. 1829 March 17

bibl.title: Letter, H.R. Frost, in Charleston, S.C., to J.G.M. Ramsey in Charleston, S.C. 1829 Mar. 17
bibl.note: 1829 Mar. 17, H.R. Frost, Dean of the Medical College, Charleston, S.C., to J.G.M. Ramsey, Charleston, S.C. Invitation to a supper to be given by the faculty of the Medical College. Enclosed are calling costs of Col. Hayne and Mitchell King.

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

keywords.term: Suppers -- South Carolina -- Charleston -- History -- 19th century.

Ramsey, J. G. M. (James Gettys McGready), 1797-1884 -- Correspondence.

revisionDesc.change: Migrating from XML to validated TEI P5.

div.p: The Faculty of the Medical College request the pleasure of Mr. J.G. Ramsey's company at supper tomorrow evening 8 Oclock at Camilla Thustons Broad Street -
